name: a5_lonlattocell
title: A5 Longitude Latitude to Cell
description: Converts geographic coordinates (longitude, latitude) to A5 cell index at specified resolution using the A5 library

inputs.name: input_table
inputs.title: Input table
inputs.description: The table containing longitude and latitude columns

inputs.name: longitude_column
inputs.title: Longitude column
inputs.description: The column containing longitude values (decimal degrees)

inputs.name: latitude_column
inputs.title: Latitude column
inputs.description: The column containing latitude values (decimal degrees)

inputs.name: resolution
inputs.title: A5 resolution
inputs.description: The A5 resolution level to index at

inputs.name: output_column_name
inputs.title: Output column name
inputs.description: Name for the output A5 cell index column

outputs.name: output_table
outputs.title: Output table
outputs.description: The table with A5 cell index column added
